title: Thomas Edison National Historical Park: Materials For Loan
body: Materials For Loan         Cover of the Invention Factory DVD available for loan. NPS Photo  Video/DVDs The Great Train Robbery: A silent film produced by Thomas Edison in 1903. (Video format only) The Invention Factory: An 18-minute orientation film about Thomas Edison and his accomplishments.(Video, DVD and DVD with open captions)  The only cost is returning the videos. To reserve a video/dvd for your classroom, contact the Traveling Trunk Coordinator or call 973-736-0550 ext. 25.
